member.name: M:LibreriaApi.Areas.HelpPage.ApiDescriptionExtensions.GetFriendlyId(System.Web.Http.Description.ApiDescription)
member.summary: Generates an URI-friendly ID for the . E.g. "Get-Values-id_name" instead of "GetValues/{id}?name={name}"

member.name: T:LibreriaApi.Areas.HelpPage.HelpPageConfig
member.summary: Use this class to customize the Help Page. For example you can set a custom to supply the documentation or you can provide the samples for the requests/responses.

member.summary: The controller that will handle requests for the help page.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.summary: Gets CLR types that are used as the content of or .

member.summary: Gets the objects that are used directly as samples for certain actions.

member.name: P:LibreriaApi.Areas.HelpPage.HelpPageSampleGenerator.SampleObjects
member.summary: Gets the objects that are serialized as samples by the supported formatters.

member.name: P:LibreriaApi.Areas.HelpPage.HelpPageSampleGenerator.SampleObjectFactories
member.summary: Gets factories for the objects that the supported formatters will serialize as samples. Processed in order, stopping when the factory successfully returns a non- object.
member.remarks: Collection includes just initially. Use SampleObjectFactories.Insert(0, func) to provide an override and SampleObjectFactories.Add(func) to provide a fallback.

member.summary: Gets the sample object that will be serialized by the formatters. First, it will look at the . If no sample object is found, it will try to create one using (which wraps an ) and other factories in .

member.name: T:LibreriaApi.Areas.HelpPage.ObjectGenerator
member.summary: This class will create an object of a given type and populate it with sample data.

member.name: M:LibreriaApi.Areas.HelpPage.ObjectGenerator.GenerateObject(System.Type)
member.summary: Generates an object for a given type. The type needs to be public, have a public default constructor and settable public properties/fields. Currently it supports the following types: Simple types: , , , , , etc. Complex types: POCO types. Nullables: . Arrays: arrays of simple types or complex types. Key value pairs: Tuples: , , etc Dictionaries: or anything deriving from . Collections: , , , , , or anything deriving from or . Queryables: , .
member.returns: An object of the given type.

member.name: T:LibreriaApi.Areas.HelpPage.SampleDirection
member.summary: Indicates whether the sample is used for request or response

member.name: T:LibreriaApi.Areas.HelpPage.TextSample
member.summary: This represents a preformatted text sample on the help page. There's a display template named TextSample associated with this class.

member.summary: A custom that reads the API documentation from an XML documentation file.

member.name: M:LibreriaApi.Areas.HelpPage.XmlDocumentationProvider.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The physical path to XML document.

members.member:
GET: api/Autor
Obtener todos los autores
JSON Autor Devuelve los valores si fueron encontrados Si no se ha encontrado

GET: api/Autor/5
Obtener un solo valor
JSON Autor Devuelve si el valor ha sido encontrado Si no ha sido encontrado

POST: api/Autor
Agregar valor
JSON Autor Devuelve si es agregado el valor Devuelve si no se ha agregado el valor

PUT: api/Autor/5
Modificar valor
JSON Autor Devuelve si se ha agregado el valor Devuelve si no se agregado el valor

DELETE: api/Autor/5
Se elimina valor
JSON Autor Devuelve si se elimina valor Devuelve si no se elimina valor
